slab-infra.name: Plumbing Trenching
slab-infra.desc: Mandatory for moving kitchen and aligning bath stack.

slab-infra.name: Internal French Drains
slab-infra.desc: Trenches along side walls to capture ground seep before it hits framing.

slab-infra.name: Topical Vapor Barrier
slab-infra.desc: High-grade epoxy seal applied to top of concrete before polishing.

slab-infra.name: Epoxy Vapor Seal
slab-infra.desc: High-performance topical barrier required for 96% RH slab.

backyard.name: Sump + Battery Backup
backyard.desc: Protects downstairs volume during SF power outages.

backyard.name: Bioswale & Soil Removal
backyard.desc: Corrects backyard slope to prevent water running under patio.

pest-defense.name: Structural Bora-Care
pest-defense.desc: Treats exposed studs after flipper drywall is removed.

pest-defense.name: Soil Termiticide Injection
pest-defense.desc: Direct treatment of soil beneath the guest bedroom corner.

electrical.name: Full Rewire & 200A Panel
electrical.desc: Complete replacement of flipper/East Star electrical.

hvac.name: Certified Abatement
hvac.desc: Containment removal of asbestos ducts and 20yr old furnace.

hvac-abatement.name: Targeted Tape Abatement
hvac-abatement.desc: Safe removal of asbestos-taped ducts. Negative air in specific zone.

hvac-abatement.name: Full Hazardous Abatement
hvac-abatement.desc: Full containment bubble for whole-system disposal.

kitchen-volume.name: 9FT Full Open (Steel)
kitchen-volume.desc: Structural steel preserves garage and creates clear span.

structural-beam.name: Reinforced Wood (LVL)
structural-beam.desc: Lower material cost. 14-16" depth. May be slightly visible below 9ft plane.

structural-beam.name: Flush Steel I-Beam
structural-beam.desc: Higher material/crane cost. Low profile (8-10"). Tucks completely into joists for seamless 9ft ceiling.

kitchen-loc.name: In-Kind / Upstairs
kitchen-loc.desc: Keep existing layout (requires garage structural posts).

kitchen-loc.name: Move Downstairs (9FT)
kitchen-loc.desc: Best ROI. Eliminates grocery climb and leverages open slab.

upstairs-wall.name: Iron & Glass Doors
upstairs-wall.desc: Preserves light and Guest Bed legality for resale.

fireplace.name: Gas Log Conversion
fireplace.desc: Leverages gas line proximity in garage ceiling.

flooring-l1.name: Engineered Hardwood (L1)
flooring-l1.desc: Calculated at ~$26/sqft (includes mandatory moisture epoxy barrier).

flooring-l1.name: Polished Concrete
flooring-l1.desc: Calculated at ~$17/sqft for 850 sqft. Breathable and flood-proof. (Note: Previous quote was $19,000)
